page.title: 03 MY DAY 2.EVENING
page.content: When school is finished I walk home for my tea.Tuesday is my favourite day because I do lots of activities.After my tea I walk to the{Sports Centre}. At the Sports Centre I play badminton for 45 minutes,after that I go swimming in the swimming pool for an hour.When I come out I walk up to the school for our{activity club}.When I get there I go into the hall where I am given a choice of what to do. There is a wide range of activities. We play small board games,table tennis, computer games,pool or knitting. I usually play table tennis or computer games. There are also refreshments like bottles of pop and sweets. At 7.30 we have a disco for half an hour until I go home.
